name: YouTube Search
description: Searches YouTube videos using SerpAPI. Returns titles, links, thumbnails, and metadata. Supports geolocation
author: Devin

SERP_API_KEY.description: SerpAPI authentication key. Required for accessing YouTube search API

search_query.description: Search terms to find YouTube videos. Supports quotes for exact matches

gl.description: Two-letter country code for regional results (us, uk, etc). Default: us

hl.description: Two-letter language code for result text (en, es, etc). Default: en

max_results.description: Maximum number of video results to return. Range: 1-100. Default: 10

results.description: Array of matching YouTube videos with metadata. Sorted by relevance

link.description: Complete URL to watch the video on YouTube

channel.description: Name of YouTube channel that posted the video

views.description: View count as formatted string (e.g., '1.2M views')

duration.description: Video length in MM:SS or HH:MM:SS format

query.description: Search query string that was used to find videos
